value.name: script: showcase
value.content:
$( document ).ready ->
  handleShowcaseDropEvent = ( event, ui ) ->
    console.log("drag item arrived")
    drag_item = $(ui.item)
    origin_list_id = $(drag_item).slot().attr('id')
    item_card_id = $(drag_item.children()[0]).data('card-id')
    $target = $('#showcase-'+origin_list_id)
    $target.show()
    $target.removeClass('hidden')
    $target.append(drag_item)
    update_url = $target.data('update-url')
    $.ajax
      url: update_url
      type: 'PUT'
      #success: 
    $.get(update_url+'?add_item='+item_card_id)


  #old_list = null

  #handleShowcaseStopEvent = (event, ui) ->
  #  new_list = ui.item.parent()
  #  if !new_list.parent().is(old_list.parent())
  #    $( this ).sortable( "cancel" )

  $('.TYPE_PLUS_RIGHT-user-showcase').sortable
    connectWith: 'TYPE_PLUS_RIGHT-user-my_contribution'
    items: ".search-result-item.item-content"
    update: handleShowcaseDropEvent
    #start: handleStartEvent
    #stop: handleShowcaseStopEvent
    dropOnEmpty: true
    revert: false
  
  $('.TYPE_PLUS_RIGHT-user-my_contribution .search-result-item.item-content').draggable
    revert: true
    connectToSortable: ".TYPE_PLUS_RIGHT-user-showcase"
